title: Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Ukraine in a dream

Interpretation of the dream of traveling to Austria in a dream can be a sign of comfort and peace. God willing, when you see a single girl traveling to Austria in a dream, this may be a sign of marriage, and God knows best. If a married woman sees that she is traveling to Austria in a dream, this may represent relief, and God knows the unseen. When you see a divorced woman traveling in Austria, this may be a sign of good things to come. And God knows the unseen.Interpretation of a dream about traveling to Ukraine in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about traveling to Ukraine in a dream We did not find specific interpretations to see thatIf the dreamer sees himself traveling in a dream, it may be a sign of positive changes, God willing. When you see tiring trips, it may be a sign of trouble and anxiety, And God knows the unseen. However, seeing walking trips in a dream can be a sign of striving to achieve desires and goals, and God has knowledge of the unseen. title: Interpretation of the travel bag symbol in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the travel bag symbol in a dream The interpretation of the travel bag symbol in a dream is considered one of the most important visions that causes many disputes between people, because the travel bag is the one in which a person takes everything. The necessary items for him in the event of a trip and the interpretations of seeing a travel bag in a dream differ. Depending on the condition of the bag, and whether the bag was stolen, or the bag was found after being lost, or the bag was stolen, or the bag was lost for any reason, between the various reasons there is a difference in interpretations and also interpretations differ according to opinion. Interpretation of seeing a travel bag in a dream With a single woman: If an unmarried woman sees a travel bag in her dream, this is evidence that God will give her goodness in her next life and that God will make it easy for her to travel outside the country, and if an unmarried woman sees that she is carrying. A heavy suitcase, this is proof that this girl has a bright future waiting for her and that Almighty God will grant her a happy marriage to a good man who may be out of the country during this time but will return to the country. Soon, or that person will return. Traveling with her abroad. Because there is a job opportunity for someone, but if a single woman sees that she is carrying a suitcase, this is joy. This is evidence that God Almighty will change the condition of this woman and she will be happy in her life and she will be in a great position in her work, even if her work is related to science, as if she were a professor. in. University for example; This is evidence that a bright scientific future awaits her when she travels abroad and sees a suitcase in a dream. Evidence that this girl will get rid of the difficulties she faces in her life and face the problems she faces wisely. Therefore, getting rid of it is a symbol of a travel bag when a single woman carries a lot of good things in her life. Interpretation of a dream about a travel bag in a dream when getting married Whenever a married woman sees in a dream a bag of blades. This is evidence that God Almighty bestows upon this woman much kindness and understanding, and kindness in many forms. This woman can bring goodness to her husband. Thus, marital life will be stable and happy, and God Almighty will bestow goodness on its children. May God bless her children. May God bless her with success in her professional and academic life, and make her happy with her family. It makes her manage the family affairs in the way the family supports her. But if a married woman sees in a dream that she is carrying a heavy bag. This is evidence that this woman is going somewhere. From this place she makes a lot of money, and if a married woman sees that she and her husband are carrying the bag, this is evidence that she will travel with her husband, but if she sees that she is carrying the bag with one of her friends, this is; Her boyfriend will be her travel companion. Separate dream interpretation In her dream is a suitcase, and if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is carrying a suitcase, then she walks barefoot on her heels while carrying it. This is evidence that this woman will face many difficulties in her life and will not be able to

title: Sprinkling water in a dream for a divorced woman

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing water splashing in a dream for one girl: When a single girl splashes water, this is a good sign that changes will occur in her life. Which makes her life more peaceful because she is suffering from problems in her life. Sprinkling for one woman is a praiseworthy thing for her, and it is an indication that there is someone she will meet She will soon meet the specifications she wants, if she is really thinking about marriage. If she sees a young man pouring water on her, this is a good sign of marriage, and perhaps God is higher and more knowledgeable than this young man. If an unmarried girl sprinkles water in a dream, this means that she will witness success in Her academic and practical life, God willing. As for when a girl sprinkles dirty water on the ground, perhaps it is a sign of the corruption of her morals and her actions that do not please God Almighty. This dream should be taken as a warning so that she repents and stops what she is doing. When she dreams that water has touched her body, then this A sign for her of the high status she will reach. Likewise, if water touches the body, it will be good news for her that she will obtain something dear and valuable. Perhaps this thing is the reason for the change in life, for God is Most High and Most Knowing. When she sees someone sprinkling water on her and you see that she is a beautiful woman Do that with her. It symbolizes the disappearance of problems and sorrows that greatly affected her mental state. The unmarried woman communicated when she saw in a dream that she was spraying clean water. This indicates her marriage to a righteous person who adheres to righteousness and good qualities, and God knows best. Seeing water spraying is considered for women For single women, it is a good sign of the things that she will achieve and achieve in life. If she sees a handsome young man sprinkling water on her, this is a sign of her future marriage, which will testify to the steadfastness of a God-fearing man. When an unmarried woman sprinkles water inside a university or school, it is good for her to succeed. She excels during the school year. The unclean water that the girl is spraying is evidence that she is a disreputable girl and that she needs to change herself well. See also: Interpretation of seeing water in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing water splashing in a dream for a married womanWhen a married woman dreams of sprinkling water on her husband. It indicates a strong relationship between them as well as a life full of happiness. When a married woman sprinkles water on her husband. This symbolizes what this woman does for her family in order to fully meet their needs and requests. If the husband is the one who sprinkles water on him in the dream and is happy with it. It is It symbolizes the beginning of pregnancy if she is already suffering from delayed childbearing.. And God Almighty is All-Knowing. If a married woman is sprinkling water inside the house. A good sign regarding the material conditions that will improve, which will make her prosperous and God will provide her with what is abundant. Sprinkling water in the house for a married woman is considered In a dream, it is a sign of stability in life and that she lives in luxury and prosperity. Seeing water splashing on a married woman is a sign of the misfortunes that she will endure, asking God Almighty for help. Drinking a large amount of water in a dream for a married woman

title: Interpretation of sweets in a dream The correct and complete interpretations of sweets in dreams by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the article below, we explain what is the interpretation of seeing sweetness in a dream. According to what the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin mentioned in his book “Interpretation of Dreams,” halo means sweets made of sugar, sweet flavors, and bright colors that are added to them and made on happy occasions and presented to others. The sleeper may see in his dream that he is eating sweets, or making them, or giving them to others, and wants to know the meaning of that vision that he saw in his dream. Interpretation of seeing sweets in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Follow us. Interpretation of a dream in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin said: If he sees A person candy in his sleep: This is a vision that indicates a beautiful woman. Seeing eating sweets in a dream means that the dreamer will marry a woman of extraordinary beauty. Watching buying candy in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s wedding is approaching. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving candy to others, this is a good vision. It portends the stability of his circumstances, and this vision also shows the good psychological state that the individual has. In general, seeing sweets in a dream brings praiseworthy things to the dreamer. Eating sweets in a dream for a single womanIf a single girl sees in her dream that she is eating sweets, this means that she will meet new people And establishing new relationships. Seeing sweets in an unmarried girl’s dream foretells that she will hear news that will bring joy to her heart in the near future and the arrival of pleasant and cheerful events. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is giving sweets as a gift to others, this is a sign that the dreamer is experiencing a period of Psychological stability and she has feelings of love and affection towards people. Interpretation of eating sweets in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is eating sweets, this is a good vision that foretells that she will earn a great livelihood in the near future. Seeing sweets in a married woman’s dream means that there are upcoming pleasant events that will bring Joy to her home. Interpretation scholars say: Seeing candy in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life. Eating sweets in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees candy in her dream, this is a good vision that portends an easy and trouble-free delivery. If a married woman sees in her dream She is eating sweets, this is good news that God will bless her with a female birth. Interpretation of a dream about eating sweets for a divorced woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a divorced woman eating sweets in a dream is a dream that brings her good news. This vision indicates that the dreamer’s circumstances will change for the better and she will live a stable and peaceful life. If A married woman sees that she is buying and eating sweets and they taste delicious, then this is a sign that she knows a man who wants to marry her and will always seek to compensate her for what she has suffered in her life. Buying sweets in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is buying sweets, this is a good vision that promises him that he will obtain a great livelihood. In the near future. Seeing yourself buying sweets in a dream means a happy and trouble-free life, the coming of pleasant events and hearing happy news. A gift

title: Interpretation of seeing numbers from 0 to 10 in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the numbers from 0 to 10 in a dream according to Ibn Sirin and the Nabulsi dream. Learn more on Al-Mozat website. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy: Seeing the number zero (0) in a dream. In this period we are talking about seeing the number zero (0) in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number zero in a dream The meaning of the presence of the number zero in a dream, the number zero in a dream, the interpretation of the appearance of the number zero in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of the appearance of the number zero in a dream by Al-Nabulsi. Zero is the master of numbers and numbers, and the circular shape of zero indicates existence and non-existence at the same time. It is the only number that adds value to the rest of the numbers and numbers and it is the most influential number in the system of equations. Seeing zero in a woman’s dream symbolizes fertility and is one of the numbers that portends pregnancy. Or about to give birth, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number one (1) and the numbers 11, 111 in a dream. The number and the number one (1) is a symbol of the beginning, rule, and priorities in a person’s life. Seeing it in an unmarried girl’s dream is a symbol of love, intercourse, or marriage, and seeing it in a dream Single also symbolizes marriage. The number one symbolizes unity in monotheism, and that God is one and the same, and it is a symbol of the universe, power and existence. It can also indicate spiritual energy and intelligence, which is a symbol of power, kingship and success, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number two (2) And the number 22, 222, 200, 2000 in a dream. In this paragraph we are talking about seeing the number two (2) and the number 22, 222, 200, 2000 in a dream. The number 2 is a symbol of beauty, femininity, sweetness, and elegance, and it is also a symbol of marriage or love. In a dream other than Married and unmarried, it is a harbinger of marriage. It is a symbol of strong real relationships such as brotherhood or friendship, and it can symbolize blessing and the multiplication of livelihood and money, and God knows best. Seeing the number three, 3, the number 33, 13, 300, 30, and so on in the dream. In this paragraph, we are talking about seeing The number three is 3 and the number 33, 13, 300, 30 and so on in the dream. Interpretation of seeing the number three in a dream, the meaning of the presence of the number three in a dream, the number three in a dream, interpretation of seeing the number three in a dream by Ibn Sirin, interpretation of seeing the number. Three in Nabulsi’s dream. The number 3 in a dream is the number that a person does not see in his dream unless he wakes up with happy and joyful news or event and his wishes are fulfilled. It is the lucky number. Seeing the number 3 in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of the home and its financial and family circumstances, and brings goodness in life. The dream of an unmarried and pregnant woman, and God knows best. Seeing the number four 4 and the numbers 40, 44, 14, 400, etc. In a dream, in this paragraph we are talking about seeing the number four 4 and the numbers 40, 44, 14, 400 etc. In a dream.Interpretation of seeing the number four in a dream, the meaning of the presence of the number four in a dream, the number four in a dream, the interpretation of seeing the number four in a dream by Ibn Sirin, the interpretation of seeing the number. Four in Nabulsi’s dream. The number 4 is an indicator and sign of logic, balance, and conservatism, and it can symbolize strictness and commitment to faith and identity in some cases. Also,

title: Interpretation of seeing a clock in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a clock by Ibn Sirin: If a person sees a clock in a dream and it is set, this indicates a stable life. Whoever sees a clock in a dream that is incorrect and has a bad appearance, this indicates some problems in the dreamer’s life. A wall clock in a dream is an indication of unpleasant news. If someone sees in a dream that the clock is ringing loudly, this is a warning of something bad that he is doing. Whoever sees that he is looking at the clock a lot in the dream, this is evidence that the dreamer does not easily back down from his decisions. Whoever sees that he is getting a watch as a gift, this is a sign Indicates that he is about to get what he wants. A dark watch in a dream is good for the dreamer and the fulfillment of a wish. A golden watch in a dream indicates happy news. A golden watch in a single man’s dream is evidence of marriage in the near future. A sick person who sees a watch in a dream will recover from his illness. The golden watch on hand is under the protection of God Almighty. The dream shows this person’s good standing with God. Whoever sees a clock hanging on the wall could be the arrival of good news. The golden watch is evidence of sustenance, whether through money or offspring. Interpretation of the clock for a single woman. If he sees an unmarried woman inside a dream about a wristwatch. This is evidence that her wedding is approaching. If he sees a gold watch in a dream, this indicates that the groom is in good financial condition. Seeing a silver or white watch in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence that her engagement is approaching. Whoever dreams that she is wearing a broken watch, this indicates That her marriage will be delayed. If he sees that he is giving someone a watch as a gift, this is a sign of the good news that he will receive. Interpretation of the display of a watch for a married woman. If a married woman sees a wristwatch in a dream, this indicates her marital happiness and the stability of the relationship between her and her husband. If she sees that she is driving a wristwatch There are some problems between her and her husband. If a married woman sees that she is taking out a wall clock, she will get rid of her problems. Interpretation of dropping a clock for a pregnant woman: The clock in a dream is a holder of a female birth certificate. If she sees a golden watch, this indicates an easy birth and the arrival of a beautiful child.

title: I dreamed that my sister cursed me in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that my sister was cursing me in a dream. The dreamer asks about the meanings of his dream according to the scholars of interpretation, so we present below what I dreamed about that my sister insulted me in a dream and other details. I dreamed that my sister insulted me in a dream. I dreamed that my sister insulted me in a dream. And God knows best. When a married man sees an insult in a dream, it could be a sign of humiliation and disgust for the single person, and God knows the unseen. And if the dreamer sees an insult, it may be a sign of humiliation, and God is Most High and All-Knowing, while a curse from a humble person to a holder of a position may indicate adversity, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of Dreams For a person cursing my mother in a dream. Interpretation of dreams for a person cursing my mother in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing insults can be a sign of humiliation, and God knows the unseen. Scientists have indicated that a curse is insulting to a slanderer, and glory is given to the slanderer, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. In the event The humble dreamer saw an insult to a person of stature. This may be a sign of misfortune for the afflicted person, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a foolish woman chasing me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing a foolish woman chasing me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a crazy man chasing me in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God knows best. Where if a single girl sees a crazy man chasing her, he can relieve her of her worries, God willing. When I see a crazy person following me in a dream, it could be a sign. To get rid of problems, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a frightened person in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a frightened man in a dream could be a sign of repentance, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if the dreamer sees a frightened person in a dream, this may be evidence of fearing God and preserving his happiness, and God knows the unseen. When you see a frightened man at ease, this may lead to his good character, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of a woman praying with a man in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of a woman praying with a man in a dream could lead to committing sins, and God knows best. As for a married woman, if she is seen praying behind a man, this may lead to Goodness and piety, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see a woman crying during prayer, it may be a sign of getting rid of stress, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself praying for a married woman in trouble, this may lead to relief from trouble, God willing. Interpretation of dreams for a man who smells bad in his body. Dream Interpretation of a man who emits a foul odor in a dream could be a sign of bad qualities, and God knows the unseen. When a single girl sees a bad-smelling person, it can express sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The bad breath smell of a familiar person in a dream can lead to lies and hypocrisy, by God. I know that if the dreamer sees a person who smells good, this may lead to purity, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a man’s dream of a penis in a dream. Interpretation of a man’s dream of a penis in a dream could be a sign of humiliation among people, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a man with a female in a dream, this may be a sign.

title: Interpretation of a beautiful girl in a dream: Seeing a beautiful woman in a dream

preview.html: The concept of a woman as a child or an old woman, seeing a beautiful and pretty or ugly woman, for a single girl, married, pregnant, divorced, for Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a beautiful girl in a dream Seeing a woman in a dream in general may refer to the world and its openness and possession of its pleasures and enjoyment and living in prosperity, as a woman in reality is a man's refuge and happiness, or it refers to righteousness, to correcting oneself and strengthening faith and completing it, because a man in reality by marrying a woman completes the other half of his religion and covers him and protects him from temptation. In another context, it was found in the interpretation of seeing a woman that it can refer to the ruler, president or ruler in reality, because the woman is the one who controls her husband in his desires and desires. As for seeing a beautiful and beautiful woman in a dream, this means happiness, livelihood and money that the dreamer acquires in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that a beautiful and beautiful woman enters his house, his vision shows the happiness that enters his heart in reality and the happiness that the people of this house actually live. It is said that seeing a beautiful and pretty woman is food and money that the dreamer will obtain, so if the owner of a craft or profession sees a beautiful and beautiful woman in his dream, His vision shows his profit and strength. It comes to him from his art. If the dreamer is a merchant who makes a profit from his trade, and the poor person who sees a beautiful woman in his dream, his vision indicates the death of his poverty and the livelihood of his family in reality. Whoever sees in his dream that a beautiful woman came to him, this vision indicates success and facilitation in business and difficult matters in the dreamer's real life. A beautiful and strange woman in a dream is a sign of goodness and benefit for the dreamer when he is awake. It has been said that seeing an unknown beautiful woman in a dream has good and blessed meanings with God more than seeing a beautiful and beautiful woman known to God. And whoever sees in his dream that he has a beautiful and beautiful woman, or marries her, or enters into it in a way that pleases and pleases him in the dream, this dream shows many meanings according to the situation. In it, the dreamer is awake. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness or is single and unmarried and sees a beautiful woman whom he believes is a garden maiden, then his vision indicates the testimony that he will be granted in reality. However, if the dreamer believes that this woman is one of the women of the world, but admires her beauty and beauty, then the dream indicates liberation and deliverance from worry, anxiety, distress, debts, illness and poverty in real life. And whoever is imprisoned in prison, if he sees in his dream a beautiful and beautiful woman coming to him, then his vision shows his deliverance from prison and the freedom that he will obtain in the near future. As for seeing an ugly woman in a dream, this means distress, anguish and suffering that the dreamer is experiencing. It may indicate the occurrence of calamities and sorrows in his life. It was also said that seeing an ugly woman in a dream is evidence of the temptation that appears in the dreamer's life and the distress he is going through in reality. Perhaps the dream indicates poverty, loss of money, difficulty in work or illness and everything that steals the happiness of the viewer in his daily and real life. Interpretation of a girl

The dream may indicate poverty, loss of money, difficulty in work, or illness, and everything that steals the viewer’s happiness in his daily life. And realism. Interpretation of a girl

title: Interpretation of a dream about being engaged to an unmarried woman by someone she knows, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of engaging with someone by someone you know: It may be very strange for many people, and in the following article we will learn about the most important evidence related to this topic, so let us read it below. Interpretation of a dream of engaging with someone by someone you know: Seeing an unmarried woman in a dream Addressing someone she knows means that he will actually propose marriage to her in a short time from this vision and she will be happy in her life with him. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is engaged to someone she knows, this is a sign of good news that will reach her in the coming days. In case the dreamer dreams of an engagement to someone she knows , this means that she has achieved many achievements in various matters in her life and will be proud of herself for what she will be able to achieve. Seeing a girl in her dream addressing someone she knows symbolizes that she will find a job that she has always dreamed of and that will make her very happy. Interpretation of a dream about being engaged to an unmarried woman from Before someone you know by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing an unmarried woman in a dream that she is engaged to someone she knows and has lost the ring, as a sign that she is very hesitant, and this is missing out on a lot of good opportunities. If a girl sees in her dream her engagement to someone she knows and one of the ring’s lobes falls off, this means that There are many obstacles that prevent her from achieving her goals. If the dreamer sees in her sleep the engagement of someone she knows, this expresses the critical decisions that she will soon make in many aspects of her life. The dreamer sees in her dream the engagement of someone she knows and takes off the ring, this is a sign that her engagement is not complete In reality because she does not find this person suitable for her. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s engagement by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq interprets seeing an unmarried woman in a dream about engagement as a sign that she will soon receive a marriage proposal from a person who suits her well and she will be very happy in her life with him. If the dreamer watches her engagement party While she is sleeping, this indicates her ability to achieve many things that she dreamed of, and this will make her very happy. If the dreamer sees in her dream that she is dealing with someone she loves, this expresses the good elements that will happen in her life in the coming days. Seeing a girl in her dream addressing someone who does not She loves him at all, symbolizes revealing many games that were brewing behind her back and taking the necessary precautions after that. Interpretation of a dream of getting engaged to someone by someone you do not knowSeeing an unmarried woman in a dream addressing someone you do not know indicates her ability to overcome many From embarrassing events and noticeably improving her situation afterwards. If the dreamer sees during her sleep that she is engaged to someone she does not know, this is a sign of positive changes that will occur in many aspects of her life. If the dreamer sees in her dream the engagement of someone she does not know, this indicates happy occasions. Which she is about to attend in the coming days. If a girl sees in her dream an engagement party for someone she does not know and does not agree with this matter, this is a sign that something will happen that will soon cause her great inconvenience.

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about small mice by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ibn Sirin’s Dream of Rats Rats belong to a specific genus of animals called rodents, which are the largest order of mammals in terms of the number of species. Rats are perhaps among the animals that have a great resonance in Eastern countries and are avoided by Arabs in particular, as we find that most Middle Eastern residents tend to To consider rats among the animals that the soul hates to see and tries in every way to get rid of them, it is a similar feeling in the world of dreams, and what do rats do in general and small rats in particular symbolize? Interpretation of a dream about a small rat A rat symbolizes a person whose opinion differs from his appearance or who appears People have the exact opposite of what they hide, such as the hypocrites, where you find that he believes that you are telling one of the gatherings, then he comes down on you and builds words about you that you did not reveal in another meeting. It also symbolizes an immoral woman whose evils outweigh her benefits and which a man should avoid dealing with or marrying her. According to some commentators, rats indicate the most despicable people among the Jews who are not to be trusted and should not be trusted. Small rats indicate weak enemies who tend to stab you again and again because they do not find enough courage to appear before you or announce themselves, and thus it was The fortuneteller should be more careful and wise in choosing his friends, close people, and work. Especially colleagues. Seeing it is a warning sign of danger or disaster that may befall the viewer, so he must be prepared for any new or unusual events that may occur, or he will lose the strength to continue life with all the difficulties. If the mouse is large, this indicates corruption and injustice that The dreamer has had troubles in his life, due to which he has lost many opportunities that would have made him higher. Small mice also symbolize conspiracies that are being prepared on the path he is on to prevent him from moving forward and achieving his goal. Without taking his precautions, the trap has a beautiful appearance, and therefore the rat outwardly symbolizes good things, but inside it is malicious and deadly. Ibn Shaheen says that the rat symbolizes the corrupt that deceives people in its appearance and carries evil within it, and if the rat is a different color than what it sees People, so it cannot be interpreted as a woman. Seeing mice is evidence of the large number of thieves who prevent the viewer from achieving what he wants or help waste his effort without benefiting from it. If he sees that he has a mouse, this indicates that there are those who serve him and obey his orders. According to Miller’s Encyclopedia, we find Rats carry bad meanings, including many problems whose source the viewer does not know, conflicts with colleagues, disputes within the family home, loss of investment opportunities in trade, poor psychological state, and all. The sad news will not end unless the mouse is killed. The mice are enemies in the form of friends. They sit with the fortuneteller in the dining room, and when the meal is over, they sit at another table and begin to say everything that is reprehensible about him, make his image ugly, and sing poems about miserliness and lack of food and money. And if he sees that he sitting
